name: Super Quantal Mech Beast Aeroboros
effectText:
2 Level 4 monsters
Cannot attack unless it has material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 other face-up monster on the field; change it to face-down Defense Position. This is a Quick Effect if this card has "Super Quantum Green Layer" as material. Once per turn: You can attach 1 "Super Quantum" monster from your hand or field to this card as material.
